data.question: What year was the synthesis of 2,4,6-triphenylphosphinine first reported?
What is the primary difference in electron donation between neutral phosphinin-2-ols and anionic phosphinin-2-olates?
data.answer: Neutral phosphinin-2-ols show both classical terminal 2e-donation and m2-bridging 2e-lone-pair donation, while anionic phosphinin-2-olates act as 4e-donors.

data.question: True or False: The synthesis of 2-(CH3)2N-C5H4P represents the first example of a neutral phosphinine acting as a bridging m2-P-4e donor-ligand between two CuI centers.
What method was anticipated as a suitable synthetic route to access 2-aminophosphinines?
What was the observed chemical shift in the 31P{1H} NMR spectrum for 2-(CH3)2N-C5H4P 1?
True or False: The parent phosphinine C5H5P forms infinite coordination polymers with CuBr·S(CH3)2 with terminal 2e-donation via the phosphorus lone pair.
What was the primary focus of the investigation on 2-aminophosphinines?
data.answer: To evaluate the degree of interplay between the aromaticity and the polarizing effect of an external and strongly p-donating amino group.

data.question: True or False: The synthesis of 2-(CH3)2N-6-Si(CH3)3-phosphinine 3 and 2-(CH3)2N-phosphinine 1 started from 3-(dimethylamino)-2-pyrone 2 and (CH3)3Si-C2P.
What was the result of the [4+2] cycloaddition reaction between (CH3)3Si-C2P and 3-(CH3)2N-2-pyrone?
True or False: The amino substitution increases significantly the p-electron density at the phosphorus atom in the ring of 2-(CH3)2N-phosphinine 1 compared to the parent phosphinine C5H5P.
What was the chemical shift observed in the 31P{1H} NMR spectrum for the parent phosphinine C5H5P?
True or False: The m2-P-4e coordination mode is unprecedented for neutral phosphinines.
What was the primary aim of synthesizing 2-(CH3)2N-phosphinine 1 and 2-(CH3)2N-6-Si(CH3)3-phosphinine 3?
data.answer: To show that 2-aminophosphinines are the most powerful neutral p-donating P,N-hybrid ligands, capable of forming interesting polynuclear coordination compounds.

data.question: True or False: The Cu(1)–Cu(2) distance in the structure of 5 suggests that the phosphinine ligand 1 enables cuprophilic interactions.
What was the observed resonance in the 31P{1H} NMR spectrum for phosphinine 3?
True or False: The synthesis of 2-(CH3)2N-C5H4P 1 involved a protodesilylation step.
What was the primary reason for the regioselectivity observed in the cycloaddition reaction to form 2-(CH3)2N-6-Si(CH3)3-phosphinine 3?
data.answer: Mainly electronic but also steric effects

data.question: True or False: The amino group has a stronger effect on the phosphinine p-system than the OH substituent.
What was the primary synthetic challenge addressed in the synthesis of 2-aminophosphinines?
data.answer: The synthesis of phosphorus-containing aniline derivatives, specifically 2-amino-substituted phosphinines, which were previously unknown.

data.question: True or False: The aromaticity in the ring of 2-(CH3)2N-C5H4P is only marginally decreased compared to the parent phosphinine C5H5P.
